publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5502 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Regulation of Care (Scotland) Act 2001 (Minimum Frequency of Inspections) Order 2007—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Regulation of Care (Scotland) Act 2001 (Minimum Frequency of Inspections) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*

S2M-5502 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Regulation of Care (Scotland) Act 2001 (Minimum Frequency of Inspections) Order 2007—That the Health Committee recommends that the draft Regulation of Care (Scotland) Act 2001 (Minimum Frequency of Inspections) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald
